Title: Correction to: The relationship between endogenous thymidine concentrations and [18F]FLT uptake in a range of preclinical tumour models (EJNMMI Research, (2016), 6, 63, 10.1186/s13550-016-0218-3)
Abstract: © 2017, The Author(s).Unfortunately, the original version of Figs. 4, 5 and 6b in the article [1] contained errors in the n numbers as indicated on the columns. Please note that column heights and error bars in the original figures and data in the ESM tables are correct and statistical tests are valid. These corrections do not affect any results or conclusions in this article.
